sentences.en: By the way, has your brochure been finally approved?
sentences.cn: 顺便间一下, 你写的小册子最后通过了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you have a sightseeing brochure for this town?
sentences.cn: 在这个镇上有观光手册 吗 ?

sentences.en: For a copy of their brochure, write to the above address.
sentences.cn: 欲索取其宣传册，请写信至以上地址。

sentences.en: I can't vouch for this hotel ( = I have no personal experience of it ) but it looked wonderful from the brochure.
sentences.cn: 我没住过这家旅馆,可从指南上看它很棒.

sentences.en: I need to know that soon for my brochure.
sentences.cn: 我想快些知道,因为我那本小册子里要用.

sentences.en: I want you to read the brochure completely .
sentences.cn: 我想让你把这个小册子看完。

sentences.en: I want you to read the brochure completely.
sentences.cn: 我想让你完整的阅读这个小册子.

sentences.en: Our brochure is printed on environmentally-friendly paper.
sentences.cn: 我们的小册子是用环保纸张印刷的。

sentences.en: The brochure offers a wide choice of hotels, apartments and holiday homes.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子提供了很多宾馆、公寓、度假屋供选择。

sentences.en: The characteristics of the machine are fully detailed in our brochure.
sentences.cn: 在我们这本小册子里详尽地说明了这台机器的性能.

sentences.en: The computer's features are detailed in our brochure.
sentences.cn: 该计算机的特点在我们的小册子中有详细介绍.

sentences.en: There was nothing in the brochure about having to drive the car every day to charge up the battery.
sentences.cn: 手册里只字没提这车要天天开，以给电池充电。

sentences.en: This brochure on farming was issued by the Department of Agriculture.
sentences.cn: 这本农业小册子是农业部发行的.

sentences.en: You may want to keep this brochure safe, so you have it to hand whenever you may need it.
sentences.cn: 你应该保管好这份手册，这样随时想用都能马上在手边找到。
